MYB Pipeline¶

class pybart.pipeline.myb.mybpipeline.MybPipeline(parent)¶

Pipe line use to compute epochs to determine the likelihood

compute_likelihood(l_r_TNT, l_mu_TNT_T, l_mu_TNT_NT, l_sigma_TNT_T, l_sigma_TNT_NT)¶

Compute likelihood value for Target and NoTarget

new_epochs(label, epochs)¶

This function is a slot who classifies epoch according to learning parameters and bayes priors for myb games with dynamic bayesian classification

predict_R_TNT(X, mu_MatCov_T, mu_MatCov_NT)¶

Predict the r_TNT for a new set of trials.

setting()¶

This function is use to configure the pipeline.

Here it just show the the UI setting interface. Every needed tools and parameters to configure the pipeline are in.

This function is call by the configuration panel, when setting button is clicked.

class pybart.pipeline.myb.mybsender.MybLikelihoodSender¶
send_new_likelihood(likelihood)¶

Send likelihood to the Myb game

class pybart.pipeline.myb.mybsetting.MybSettingDialog(parent)¶

Dialog window to setup the myb pipeline

load_template()¶

Load all template thanks to a .h5 file

on_step()¶

Update the calibration progress bar

pybart.pipeline.myb.mybtemplatecalibration.filtering_raw(raw, l_freq, h_freq)¶

This function filtering a raw format without using forward-backward method

pybart.pipeline.myb.mybtemplatecalibration.get_index_reject_epochs(epochs, rejection_rate)¶

This function removes Epochs from the Mne.Epochs object according a rate

pybart.pipeline.myb.mybtemplatecalibration.marking_target_events(raw_events, sequence_target)¶

This function marks targeted events thanks to a list of index

pybart.pipeline.myb.mybtemplatecalibration.riemann_template_learn(file_complete_path, rejection_rate=0.15, l_freq=0.5, h_freq=20)¶

This function is generating a riemann template.

It take one .vhdr path in argument and return a dict containing all calibration data.

Riemann template is use to calibrate the MYB game.
